description: This file defines a mock class, Store2NotificationMock, which inherits from the IStore2::INotification interface. It uses the Google Mock framework to mock the ValueChanged method, and includes interface mapping macros for runtime type information.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class for the IStore2::INotification interface, providing a mocked implementation of the ValueChanged method and interface mapping macros.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mocked method to simulate notification of value changes within the store.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
